title:
Unsupervised Anomaly Detection and Localization with Generative
  Adversarial Networks
authors: Khouloud Abdelli, Matteo Lonardi, Jurgen Gripp, Samuel Olsson, Fabien Boitier, Patricia Layec
abstract:
We propose a novel unsupervised anomaly detection approach using generative
adversarial networks and SOP-derived spectrograms. Demonstrating remarkable
efficacy, our method achieves over 97% accuracy on SOP datasets from both
submarine and terrestrial fiber links, all achieved without the need for
labelled data.
